description: Details pursuant to conditions 3 (Materials) and 4 (Landscape) of planning permission Ref: 26886/APP/2020/1067 dated 01/09/2020 (Conversion of existing bungalow to create 2 x 3-bedroom dwellings with roof extension)
decision_conditions: Condition 3 requires details of all materials and external surfaces to be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and that such details should include information relating to make, product/type and colour. The submission is in the form of a vague statement with some illustrative materials. Thus, insufficient information has been submitted and the proposal fails to comply with the requirements of condition 3 contrary to Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020).

Condition 4 requires full details of soft landscape enhancement to the site and that such details should include information relating soft landscaping, hard landscaping and a Schedule for Implementation. Very little or no information relating to this has been submitted. Thus, insufficient information has been submitted and the proposal fails to comply with the requirements of condition 3 contrary to Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14, DMEI 1 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020) and Policy 5.17 (refuse storage) of the London Plan (2016).
